reviewText: Man, these interviews really took me by surprise. I walked away from this with a stimulated mind. I think for most of watching these type of dvds that is the highest of praise.
This video blew me away. I really enjoyed the first Gardiner's World release but this definitely raises the bar. Check it out, you won't be disappointed.
did not find this dvd stimulating or refreshing...thought gardiner was a bit bored with his guests....he has other dvds that are strange and weird.

I have always been a big fan of the unknown, UFO's, secret societies, etc. This film really went into detail and touched home on a lot of very intriguing subjects. There was never a dull moment in this film and I would recommend anyone that has a soft spot for the unexplained of the past watch this film. Two thumbs up!
